roleset.name: not willing to work together
roleset.note: UNCOOPERATIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, related to cooperate.01. (from uncooperative.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: The President disliked Chavez because he hoped that Chavez would work with him, but Chavez was uncooperative with him on Iran and defiant in terms of Libya and Syria.
